#animate example.

<input type="button" name="animeBtn" value="Animate" onClick="animate(this, 'click')"  />

<style type="text/css"> 
#anime {     
background-color:#ffaa00;     
width:300px;     
height:30px;     
padding:3px; 
} 
</style> 

<div id="anime">
animate me!
</div>

<animate object="anime" move="height" amt="300" speed="3" on="btnModify.click" />
